subject: Offsite Optimisation: Where the Buyer Journey Really Starts
description_text:

Hi Atto,

Before a shopper ever visits your site, they’ve already started their buying journey. From Google Shopping and marketplaces to Instagram feeds and affiliate links—offsite product discovery is where attention is won or lost.

Our animated Fashion Ecommerce Lookbook is designed to help you master this stage of the funnel—so you can capture intent early, and convert it when they land.

See how brands like Spotlight Retail Group used Athos Commerce to enhance product discovery and optimise performance across every channel. The result? More visibility. Higher click-through. Better conversion rates across the board.

Inside the lookbook:

- Proven strategies for optimising feeds for Google Shopping, marketplaces, and social
- Best practices for increasing reach without sacrificing relevance
- Real brand examples from 14 top fashion retailers
